name: Pocket Pets!
description:
Pocket Pets! is a Tamagotchi inspired virtual pet game for the Playdate! What can you do?

  • Tend to your garden! Grow crops in real time and watch them grow even when the game is closed!
  • Care for your pet's hunger and happiness! Name it, feed it, play games with it, and use the crank to pet them!
  • Play a fast paced, action mini-game (inspired by Mega Man Battle Network)! The last 10 things fed to your pet determine your "deck" of seeds. Each plant has a different ability - discover your favorite combinations! Battle 13 different enemy types in a grueling gauntlet for rewards!
  • Check back in daily to see different seeds available in the vending machine shop and wish upon the stars for a random reward!
  • Discover 13 different pet types! Collect them all!

How to Play: Check out the game manual for information about how to play the game!

Credits:

  • 1-Bit Pack by Kenney
  • Pixel Skies by Digital Moons
  • Vending Machine Photo  by Ji Seongkwang
  • 1 Bit Fantasy Creatures by kcaze
  • Lofi music pack by Bensmir
  • Battle music by Fesliyan Studios
  • Axe SFX by Game Sound Cloud
